channel.title: Classified (two playtest games in December)
channel.description:
![Classified-Stamp-Free-Download-PNG|472x258](upload://pmgegf5F42QPbEokA49g4A7Yfw0.png)
**AKA**
AKA is a espionage focused action thriller game inspired by the TV show Alias.We follow the career of a young intelligence officer, discovering that the agency she works for is a front for a criminal organisation, balancing professional and personal commitments while maintaining her cover as a double agent.
[Session 1](https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-MlH81S5bHdt1IKioJAQ) [date=2021-12-05 time=20:00:00 timezone="Europe/Dublin"] → [date=2021-12-05 time=23:00:00 timezone="Europe/Dublin"]
[Session 2](https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-MlH8Gm31S7eBPfuDnlp ) [date=2021-12-12 time=20:00:00 timezone="Europe/Dublin"] → [date=2021-12-12 time=23:00:00 timezone="Europe/Dublin"]
**Spectre Scouts** Spectre Scouts is a special operations/military themed game focused on one last job beyond the grave.The President is dying. He has many enemies, both foreign and domestic. Those who would harm him, in life and in death. It’s the Spectre Scouts’ job to protect him, no matter the personal cost to them, and no matter how little he deserves it.
[Session 1](https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-MlH9CYDZPrRRQm-rxdN) [date=2021-12-14 time=20:00:00 timezone="Europe/Dublin"] → [date=2021-12-14 time=23:00:00 timezone="Europe/Dublin"]
[Session 2](https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-MlH9aglRj8vsOnyALCp) [date=2021-12-21 time=20:00:00 timezone="Europe/Dublin"] → [date=2021-12-21 time=23:00:00 timezone="Europe/Dublin"]
*RSVPs open to all on October 8th at 10pm GMT+1*

AKA
